input.sentences: wang is preparing pumpkins for the 14th annual halloween contest in his hometown .
wang using very distinctive tools to carve all his pumpkins .
wang carves different faces in all of his pumpkins .
wang even carves double faces on some of them .
at last wang adds the final touches | and wang 's pumpkins are now ready for display .
output.sentences: his favorite thing to carve is faces
other times he likes to draw them happy
once the work is done they look great all lit up
